about_the_game:
Herios is a collectible card game. The game is turn-based, single or multiplayer, and is based on the folklore of the medieval and supernatural world of Toria.
Through Herios, you will also be able to admire the work of seven artists who have each created cards in different styles to give the game a unique look.

  • A large collection of cards: Discover a large amount of cards, designed by seven talented artists
  • Win cards and boost their leve : Collect and improve cards, then use it to build the best strategy
  • An epic Solo Campaign: discover the world of Toria through an uncluttered visual novel in which you will have to investigate by participating in Herios tournaments in different taverns to discover who is behind the disappearance of several lords.
  • Solo and multiplayer: Play alone, or battle online on ranked mode or with your friends

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.8, 10.9, 10.10.
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 650m (1440x900), AMD Radeon HD 6750M (1440x900) or Intel HD 5000 (1366x768)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

  • OS: OS X 10.8, 10.9, 10.10.
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 650m (1440x900), AMD Radeon HD 6970M (1920x1080) or Intel Iris Pro 5200 (1440x900)
